# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Напиши слова рок пісні до дня святого валентина з двома куплетами, приспівом, бриджем і аутро, до 3 хвилин

Відповідь: Verse 1: 
Tonight's the night I've been waiting for,
A love that's been knocking on my door,
And when I saw you it was clear,
No amount of love can be spared.

Chorus:
Cause it's Valentine's Day,
And when I look into your eyes,
It's as if the stars have aligned,
It's just you, me, and the moonlight tonight.

Verse 2:
I know that what I feel is true,
As I stare into your eyes of blue,
Will you be my valentine?
I just want you to be mine.

Chorus:
Cause it's Valentine's Day,
And when I look into your eyes,
It's as if the stars have aligned,
It's just you, me, and the moonlight tonight.

Bridge:
We'll dance beneath the stars tonight,
The only thing that is on my mind,
Will you be my one true love?
My heart belongs to you above.

Chorus:
Cause it's Valentine's Day,
And when I look into your eyes,
It's as if the stars have aligned,
It's just you, me, and the moonlight tonight.

Outro:
It's just me and you,
The perfect way to spend this Valentine's Day,
I'll take your hand in mine,
And show you how much that I really feel.
